name: Team 9 - War for the Mushroom Kingdom
name_original: Team 9 - War for the Mushroom Kingdom
description:
Art - Aiden Waithe

Code - Alex Skinner

Design - Ben Fantozzi

Welcome to the war torn Mushroom Kingdom. Wowser's invasion is in full force and it's up to Carlo the Electrician to save the day following the princess's famous plumbing knight, and his cousin, being murdered with his trusty plunger.

Fight your way through 3 levels to infiltrate Wowser's castle and avenge his cousin's death.

Controls

Up/W - Jump

Left/A - Move left

Right/D - Move right

Space - Shoot

**DISCLAIMER**

All sound effects were made using bfxr.net.

Background music is The Day Time Ran Away by Ozzed and used under Creative Commons. His music can be found here: https://ozzed.net/
